column4: hi all, my computer would once in awhile freeze up when first booting in the morning.  A warm reboot and all went well.  Now it takes about 3 or 4 reboots....any ideas what might be causing this?  I ran memtest and found one bad memory module....replaced with a good one...but problem persists.
heat issue? cpu not seated properly? bad hardware (hard drive)?
i dont think it is a heat issue as it happens generally when the machine is starting from cold boot
